description:
According to Joy Behar, people only voted for Trump because they were misinformed. And it does not matter that you lived through one of the worst inflation crises in recent history, as the "statistics" proved you should have voted against your best interest.

NEW: Joy Behar fumes that people think The View is "one-sided," says they are the truth tellers because they share "statistics."

Behar couldn't fathom how someone could vote for Trump before theorizing that it was because they are "misinformed" by other networks.

"I don't know… pic.twitter.com/lp9WJOXItL
title: Watch: The shrill harpies from "The View" claim they aren't onesided, but YOU'RE an idiot for supporting Donald Trump

description:
During the Panny D, the phrases “follow the science” and “trust the experts” were coined, even though everything and everyone they demanded we blindly follow was wrong. Everything these “experts” demanded we do was arbitrary, at best, although the left treated it as Gospel.

Neil deGrasse Tyson has no shortage of asinine take these days, and while he believes weight class is far better to divide people in sports than sex, he also believes people like him, aka experts, are God. Thus, if you don’t blindly follow everything they say and do, while never thinking for yourself, you could LITERALLY die.
title: Watch: Neil deGrasse Tyson rants that if you don't blindly trust the experts, you may literally die
